content: faded diamonds by suzy daisy boo creations *disclaimer* pattern copyright © daisy boo creations 2018 this pattern is licensed for unlimited personal use you are strictly prohibited from reproducing or selling this pattern the pattern may not be copied in any way print or digitally in part or in full except for personal reference by purchasing this pattern you are granted a limited license to create items to be sold that are made from this pattern subject to the following conditions all items must include a credit to daisy boo creations including the pattern name and website www daisyboo net if you are unsure as to how this license affects you please contact suzy@daisyboo net this pattern is written using uk terms with us terms written in brackets alongside you will also find a chart at the end stitches used chain - chain st - stitch sl-st - slip_stitch treble_crochet - uk treble_crochet us double_crochet - double_crochet fptr -uk front post treble_crochet us fpdc - front post double_crochet bptr - uk back post treble_crochet us bpdc - back post double_crochet materials for this pattern i used a scheepjes whirl in rhubarb bumble you will need a 3mm crochet hook a sewing needle scissors pattern i have incorporated a simple edging into the pattern which we will make as we go start by chaining 58 + 3 the + 3 is your first stitch on row 1 1 in the 4th chain from the hook make a half_double_crochet half_double_crochet now half_double_crochet half_double_crochet across the row you should have 59 stitches in total turn 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in every stitch across the row 59 stitches in total turn 3 chain 1 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in every stitch across the row 59 stitches in total turn 4 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts chain 1 miss 1 st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 5 sts * chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st* repeat from * to * 17 times across the row you should have 11 sts left treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts turn 5 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts chain 1 miss the chain space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st chain 1 miss the chain space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts fptr fpdc in the next st *chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st make a treble_crochet double_crochet in the next chain space chain 1 miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet
